metadata.title: USN-6619-1 -- runC vulnerability
metadata.description: Rory McNamara discovered that runC did not properly manage internal file descriptor while managing containers. An attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain sensitive information or bypass container restrictions.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6619-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  golang-github-opencontainers-runc-dev - 1.1.4-0ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm1 runc - 1.1.4-0ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
